title: Internal IP Address Disclosure
overview: <paragraph>While reviewing <<CUSTOMER>>'s web server, web servers were discovered to disclose the system's internal IP address via the Content-Location header. The disclosure of the systems internal IP address gives an adversary an indication of how the internal network my be addressed.</paragraph>
remediation: <paragraph>It is recommended that <<CUSTOMER>> reconfigure their web servers to use the systems fully qualified domain name (FQDN).</paragraph>
